label: Organization & Formatting
description: Most formatting guidelines are followed; only one or two components from the template are missing.

label: Organization & Formatting
description: Most formatting guidelines are followed; several components from the template are missing or incomplete.

label: Survey Content
description: All required content is present in the survey.qmd file with proper logic in the app.R file

label: Survey Content
description: All required content is present in the survey.qmd file with proper logic in the app.R file, though it may need one or two small fixes to work properly.

label: Survey Content
description: Required content is incomplete and / or missing, and there are multiple fixes required before the app runs.

label: Conjoint Questions
description: Randomized conjoint questions render on live survey without error.

label: Conjoint Questions
description: Randomized conjoint questions render on live survey with only one or two errors (e.g. image load fail).

label: Conjoint Questions
description: Randomized conjoint questions have major issues rendering on the live survey. Page load fails or content is displayed in an unintelligle manner.

label: surveydown
description: Entire survey renders on live survey without errors, user can get to end and questions are clear and understandable.

label: surveydown
description: The survey contains one or two errors when rendering on shinyapps.io, but the user can still get to the end of the survey.

label: surveydown
description: An error page displays preventing continuation in the survey, or multiple major errors exist in the survey making it difficult to understand the questions.
